jobs.title: Jedi Knight
accomplishments: Led clone trooper squadrons in numerous successful campaigns during the Clone Wars
Mentored Padawan Ahsoka Tano, overseeing her training and development
Piloted various starfighters in space battles, consistently outperforming enemy pilots
Conducted diplomatic missions on behalf of the Jedi Council and Galactic Senate

jobs.title: Padawan
accomplishments: Trained under Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi
Participated in the Battle of Geonosis, demonstrating exceptional combat skills
Assisted in various peacekeeping missions across the galaxy
